requestBody.description:
References to the products that should be updated, and the new values
for the stock or price fields. It is possible to supply only one of the two fields
or both.

200.description: **Message** can be **"Updates processed without warnings"** or in case of validations **"Updates processed, see 'Content' for warnings"**

requestBody.description: References to the new values for the stock fields.

200.description: **Message** can be **"Updates processed without warnings"** or in case of validations **"Updates processed, see 'Content' for warnings"**

get.description: Gets orders based on the available filters.

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description: Order status(es) to filter on. AWAITING_PAYMENT orders will be excluded if it is not included in this Statuses filter.

parameters.name: emailAddresses
parameters.description: Client emailaddresses to filter on.

parameters.name: merchantOrderNos
parameters.description: Filter on unique order reference used by the merchant.

parameters.name: channelOrderNos
parameters.description: Filter on unique order reference used by the channel.

parameters.name: commercialOrderNos
parameters.description: Filter on commercial order numbers.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description:
Filter on the order date, starting from this date. This date is inclusive.
The order date is based on the data we got from a channel.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description:
Filter on the order date, until this date. This date is exclusive.
The order date is based on the data we got from a channel.

parameters.name: fromCreatedAtDate
parameters.description:
Filter on the created at date in ChannelEngine, starting from this date. This date is inclusive.
The created date is set on the date and time when the order is created.

parameters.name: toCreatedAtDate
parameters.description:
Filter on the created at date in ChannelEngine, until this date. This date is exclusive.
The created date is set on the date and time when the order is created.

parameters.name: excludeMarketplaceFulfilledOrdersAndLines
parameters.description: Exclude order (lines) fulfilled by the marketplace (amazon:FBA, bol:LVB, etc.)

parameters.name: fulfillmentType
parameters.description:
Filter orders on fulfillment type. This will include all orders lines, even if they are partially fulfilled by the marketplace.
To exclude orders and lines that are fulfilled by the marketplace from the response, set ExcludeMarketplaceFulfilledOrdersAndLines to true.

parameters.name: onlyWithCancellationRequests
parameters.description:
Filter on orders containing cancellation requests.
Some channels allow a customer to cancel an order until it has been shipped.
When an order has already been acknowledged in ChannelEngine, it can only be cancelled by creating a cancellation.

parameters.name: channelIds
parameters.description: Filter orders on channel(s).

parameters.name: stockLocationIds
parameters.description: Filter on stock locations

parameters.name: isAcknowledged
parameters.description: Filter on acknowledged value

parameters.name: fromUpdatedAtDate
parameters.description: Filter on the order update date, starting from this date. This date is inclusive.

parameters.name: toUpdatedAtDate
parameters.description: Filter on the order update date, unitl this date. This date is exclusive.

parameters.name: fromAcknowledgedDate
parameters.description: Filter on the order acknowledged date, starting from this date. This date is inclusive.

parameters.name: toAcknowledgedDate
parameters.description: Filter on the order acknowledged date, unitl this date. This date is exclusive.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to filter on. Starts at 1.

get.description: Gets orders with the status **New**.

parameters.name: stockLocationId
parameters.description: The ChannelEngine id of the stock location.

post.description:
Uploads an order invoice PDF from Base64 string.
Invoice size must be less than 1 mb.

Updates or creates products. The endpoint is purge and replace.
If you do not include an attribute, it is overwritten with null.
Extra data arrays are not effected by purge and replace, and remain unchanged.
To exclude stock from the update, set the **Ignore stock** attribute to **true**.
To exclude price from the update, set the **Ignore price** attribute to **true**.

**NB:** the **Merchant product number** must be unique.

200.description: If products don't pass validations then **ProductMessages** in 'Content' are filled

get.description: Retrieve all products. Apply available filters to narrow down your search.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description:
Search product(s) by Name, MerchantProductNo, Ean or Brand
This search is applied to the result after applying the other filters.

parameters.name: eanList
parameters.description: Search products by submitting a list of EAN's.

parameters.name: merchantProductNoList
parameters.description: Search products by submitting a list of MerchantProductNo's.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to filter on. Starts at 1.

patch.description:
Updates specific attributes of product data. You can update single or multiple attributes for one or multiple products.
You can also add custom attributes via this endpoint. The format of this endpoint is JSON Patch.
Products are updated for the fields listed in the array **PropertiesToUpdate**:
[name,
description,
details,
brand,
size,
color,
ean,
groupno **or** ParentMerchantProductNo,
groupno2 **or** ParentMerchantProductNo2,
type,
merchantproductno,
vendorproductno,
stock,
price,
listprice **or** MSRP,
purchaseprice,
minprice,
maxprice,
discountrate,
vatrate,
margin,
shippingcost,
shippingtime,
url,
imageurl,
extraimageurl1,
extraimageurl2,
extraimageurl3,
extraimageurl4,
extraimageurl5,
extraimageurl6,
extraimageurl7,
extraimageurl8,
extraimageurl9,
categoryid,
vatratetype]

Sample request:

PATCH /v2/products
{
 "PropertiesToUpdate": [
 "name",
 "description"
 ],
 "MerchantProductRequestModels": [
 {
 "MerchantProductNo": "testMerchantProductNo",
 "Name": "testName",
 "Description": "testDescription",
 },
 {
 "MerchantProductNo": "testMerchantProductNo2",
 "Name": "testName3",
 "Description": "testDescription1",
 }
 ]
}

requestBody.description:
1) PropertiesToUpdate: Fields to update
2) MerchantProductRequestModels: Products to be updated

delete.description:
Deletes a product based on the **Merchant product number**.

**NB:** ChannelEngine deactivates but does not delete the product entirely, as it might be still referenced in orders.
Therefore, the references used for this product cannot be reused.

parameters.name: merchantProductNo
parameters.description: The MerchantProductNo of the product you wish to delete.

get.description: Retrieves a product based on the **Merchant product number**.

parameters.name: merchantProductNo
parameters.description: The unique product reference used by the Merchant (sku).

patch.description:
Updates specific attributes of a single product based on the **Merchant product number**. The endpoint uses the [JSON Patch](http://jsonpatch.com/).

Sample request:

 PATCH /v2/products/{merchantProductNo}
 {
 "value": "Value",
 "path": "Name",
 "op": "replace"
 }

Adding ExtraData:

 PATCH /v2/products/{merchantProductNo}
 {
 "value": {"key": "Key1", "value": "value1"},
 "path": "extraData/0",
 "op": "add"
 }

Replacing ExtraData (will replace entire ExtraData collection):

 PATCH /v2/products/{merchantProductNo}
 {
 "value": [{"key": "Key1", "value": "value1"}],
 "path": "extraData",
 "op": "replace"
 }

Removing all ExtraData:

 PATCH /v2/products/{merchantProductNo}
 {
 "path": "extraData",
 "op": "replace"
 }

Or:

 PATCH /v2/products/{merchantProductNo}
 {
 "path": "extraData",
 "op": "remove"
 }

parameters.name: merchantProductNo
parameters.description: The MerchantProductNo of the product you wish to patch

requestBody.description:
The JsonPatchDocument providing the operations you wish to perform on the product.
Value contains the value you wish to set on the property you're updating (used with operations "add" and "replace").
Path contains the path to the property you're updating (e.g. Description). Every property in the model used for creation an updating can be used.
Op contains the operation you wish to perform ("add","replace","remove").
From is only used when using the "move" operation. It refers to the source path of the value to be moved.

post.description:
Deletes a products based on the **Merchant product number**.

**NB:** ChannelEngine deactivates but does not delete the products entirely, as they might be still referenced in orders.
Therefore, the references used for these products cannot be reused.

requestBody.description: The list of MerchantProductNo of the products you wish to delete.

200.description: **Message** can be **"Items successfully deleted"** or in case of validations **"Items successfully deleted. Warning:..."**

patch.summary: Adds, updates, or deletes custom attributes
patch.description:
Adds, updates, or deletes the custom attributes (a.k.a. extra data keys) for multiple products.
You can update single or multiple attributes for one or multiple products. The format of this endpoint is [JSON Patch](http://jsonpatch.com/).

**NB:** the **Merchant product number** must be unique.

Sample request:

PATCH /v2/products/extra-data/bulk
[
 {
 "MerchantProductNo": "{merchantProductNo}",
 "Operations": [
 {
 "Op": "add",
 "Key": "{Key}",
 "Value": "{Value}"
 }
 ]
 },
 {
 "MerchantProductNo": "{merchantProductNo}",
 "Operations": [
 {
 "Op": "replace",
 "Key": "{Key}",
 "Value": "{Value}"
 },
 {
 "Op": "add",
 "Key": "{Key}",
 "Value": "{Value}"
 }
 ]
 },
 {
 "MerchantProductNo": "{merchantProductNo}",
 "Operations": [
 {
 "Op": "remove",
 "Key": "{Key}",
 "Value": "{Value}"
 }
 ]
 }
 ]

patch.summary: Adds, updates, or deletes a custom attribute
patch.description:
Adds, updates, or deletes the specific custom attribute (a.k.a. extra data key) for a single product.
You can update a single attribute for a product. The format of this endpoint is [JSON Patch](http://jsonpatch.com/).

**NB:** the **Merchant product number** must be unique.

Sample requests:

Adding ExtraData:

 PATCH /v2/products/extra-data
 {
 "MerchantProductNo": "{merchantProductNo}",
 "Operations": [
 {
 "Op": "add",
 "Key": "{Key}",
 "Value": "{Value}"
 }
 ]
 }

Updating ExtraData:

 PATCH /v2/products/extra-data
 {
 "MerchantProductNo": "{merchantProductNo}",
 "Operations": [
 {
 "Op": "replace",
 "Key": "{Key}",
 "Value": "{Value}"
 }
 ]
 }

Removing ExtraData with key:

 PATCH /v2/products/extra-data
 {
 "MerchantProductNo": "{merchantProductNo}",
 "Operations": [
 {
 "Op": "remove",
 "Key": "{Key}",
 }
 ]
 }

post.summary: Updates selected products and sets them either to frozen or not-frozen status.
post.description:
Changes state of products by updating it with FREEZE or UNFREEZE state.
All fields are required.
Creates a custom attribute group based on the set of custom attributes (a.k.a. extra data keys).

requestBody.description: Collection of product attribute groups with linked product extra data keys.

get.description: Gets the custom attribute groups based on the **Group name** provided.

parameters.description: The page to filter on. Starts at 1.

Deletes the custom attribute group based on the **Group name** provided.
**NB:** you can only delete a custom attribute group that does not have any markeplaces (a.k.a. channels) linked to it.

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.description: The group name of the product attribute group you wish to delete.

put.summary: Adds custom attributes to a group
put.description:
Adds the provided custom attributes (a.k.a. extra data keys) to the custom attribute group.
**NB:** you can only add existing custom attributes to a group.

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.description: The group name of the product attribute group you wish to add product extra data.

requestBody.description: Product extra data keys to be added.

put.summary: Deletes custom attributes from a group
put.description:
Removes the custom attributes (a.k.a. extra data keys) from the custom attribute group.
**NB:** you can only remove existing custom attributes from a group.

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.description: The group name of the product attribute group you wish to remove product extra data.

requestBody.description: Product extra data keys to be removed.

post.summary: Acknowledges lines of a purchase order
post.description:
Creates line acknowledgements (i.e., accepted, backordered, rejected) for a purchase order.
Request will be accepted and data persisted only if all validations passed.
Any validation messages and errors will be returned in a HTTP 4xx response.

requestBody.description: Model for purchase order and lines data to be acknowledged with the channel.

post.description:
Creates invoice for a purchase order.
Request will be accepted and data persisted only if all validations passed.
Any validation messages and errors will be returned in a HTTP 4xx response.

post.description:
Creates invoices for a purchase orders in a bulk.
Request will be accepted and data persisted only if all validations passed.
Any validation messages and errors will be returned in a HTTP 4xx response.

Creates a settlement report based on the **Settlement ID** provided. There are 3 types of reports:
**SUMMARY** - a high level financial overview.
**DETAILED** - a detailed report containing all transactions.
**CUSTOM_JSON** - a report grouped by orders, you can name the csv columns with a JSON file.

All the settlements are automatically acknowledged if that was not already the case.
**NB:** depending on the number of transactions within the settlement, it can take a few minutes for the report to be generated.

requestBody.description: To provide settlementIds and type of report SUMMARY or DETAILED.

get.summary: Gets the status of a settlement report
get.description:
Returns a report status based on the **Report ID** provided. There are four statuses:
**IN_PROGRESS** - the report is still being created.
**DONE** - the report has been created.
**FAILED** - the report creation failed.
**NOT_FOUND** - the Report ID was not found.

**NB:** if the status is **DONE**, the response contains a URL with a download path.

Gets a settlement report based on the **Report ID** provided. The generated report is a CSV file with a semicolon (;) as a delimiter.
If a field has a comma (,) then it is enclosed in quotes ("").

post.description:
Marks an order as fully or partially shipped, based on the order line and quantity input.
Indicate the **Stock location ID** if you make use of multiple stock locations.

put.description: Updates an existing shipment with tracking information and shipping method.

parameters.name: merchantShipmentNo
parameters.description: The merchant's shipment reference.

post.description:
Posts a request to get the available marketplace carrier offers.

**NB:** this endpoint is used to buy a shipping label through the marketplace.

parameters.name: merchantOrderNo
parameters.description: The merchant's order reference.

post.summary: Creates a shipment and initiates shipping label generation
post.description:
Marks an order as either fully or partially shipped, based on the order line and quantity input.
It also provides the marketplace with information necessary to generate a shipping label.
If you make use of multiple stock locations, indicate the **Stock location ID**.

**NB:** to request a shipping label, include information on the package size (i.e.: dimensions and weight).

get.description:
Downloads the shipping label for the shipment.

**NB:** it may take some time between the creation of the shipment and the availability of the label.
A "404 not found" error might indicate that the label is not available yet.

parameters.name: merchantShipmentNo
parameters.description: The unique shipment reference as used by the merchant.

get.description:
Gets the different stock locations in use.
**NB:** the response may include stock locations for 'marketplace fulfilment' solutions (e.g.: FBA, LVB, ZFS, etc.).
Use the retrieved IDs to get the stock of products in specific stock locations, such as the FBA stock.

post.description: Creates a stock location on ChannelEngine.

get.description: Gets all webhooks created on ChannelEngine.

post.description: Creates a webhook on ChannelEngine.

parameters.name: webhookName
parameters.description: The unique name of a webhook you want to delete.

ChannelOrderNo.description: Channel's identifier of the purchase order

MerchantProductNo.description:
Merchant's identifier of the product.
The combination of ChannelOrderNo + MerchantProductNo identifies the order line this shipment line
ships.

QuantityUnitSize.description: The case size, when QuantityUnitOfMeasure is 'CASES'. Otherwise, it is 1.

ExpiryDate.description:
The date that determines the limit of consumption or use of a product.
For perishable products.

CarrierShipmentNo.description:
The field is also known as PRO number is a unique number assigned by the carrier.
It is used to identify and track the shipment that goes out for delivery.
This field is mandatory for US, CA, MX shipment confirmations of Amazon Vendor

MerchantShipmentNo.description: The number the merchant uses to identify this PO shipment

ShippedDate.description: When the shipment will be/was shipped

EstimatedDeliveryDate.description: Estimated delivery time in the channel's warehouse

SellingPartyId.description: The merchant's identifying 'selling party number' at the channel

ShipToPartyId.description: The destination's 'ship to party' number at the channel

BillOfLadingNumber.description: Bill Of Lading (BOL) number is the unique number assigned by the vendor. The BOL present in the Shipment Confirmation message ideally matches the paper BOL provided with the shipment, but that is no must. Instead of BOL, an alternative reference number (like Delivery Note Number) for the shipment can also be sent in this field.

Lines.description: Shipment information for each shipped product

MerchantShipmentNo.description: The number the merchant uses to id this PO shipment

ChannelShipmentNo.description: The number the channel uses to id this PO shipment

EstimatedDeliveryDate.description: Estimated delivery time in the channel's warehouse

CarrierShipmentNo.description: The number the carrier uses to id this PO shipment

BillOfLadingNumber.description: Bill of Lading number (not unique for a shipment)

LastMerchantUpdatedAt.description: The last time the shipment was updated by the merchant

LastExportedAt.description: The last time the shipment was exported to the channel

Lines.description: The products in this PO shipment

Id.description: ChannelEngine identifier of the shipment line

ChannelOrderNo.description:
The number the channel uses to identify the purchase order,
which this line (partially) ships.

ItemSequenceNumber.description:
Item sequence number for the item. The first item will be 001, the second 002, and so on.
This number is used as a reference to refer to this item from the carton or pallet level.

ChannelProductNo.description: The number the channel uses to identify the product

MerchantProductNo.description: The number the merchant uses to identify the product

QuantityUnitSize.description: The case size, in the event that we ordered using cases. Otherwise, it is 1.

ExpiryDate.description:
The date that determines the limit of consumption or use of a product.
For perishable products.

Line1.description: The first address line, use this field if address validation is disabled in ChannelEngine.

Line2.description: The second address line, use this field if address validation is disabled in ChannelEngine.

Line3.description: The third address line, use this field if address validation is disabled in ChannelEngine.

FirstName.description: The first name of the customer.

LastName.description: The last name of the customer (includes the surname prefix [tussenvoegsel] like 'de', 'van', 'du').

StreetName.description:
The name of the street (without house number information)
This field might be empty if address validation is disabled in ChannelEngine.

HouseNr.description:
The house number
This field might be empty if address validation is disabled in ChannelEngine.

HouseNrAddition.description:
Optional. Addition to the house number
If the address is: Groenhazengracht 2c, the address will be:
StreetName: Groenhazengracht
HouseNo: 2
HouseNrAddition: c
This field might be empty if address validation is disabled in ChannelEngine.

Original.description:
Optional. The address as a single string: use in case the address lines are entered
as single lines and later parsed into street, house number and house number addition.

MerchantProductNo.description: The unique product reference used by the Merchant (sku).

Quantity.description: Quantity of the product to cancel.

Id.description: The unique cancellation line identifier used by ChannelEngine.

MerchantProductNo.description: The unique product reference used by the Merchant.

ChannelProductNo.description: The unique product reference used by the Channel.

Quantity.description: Quantity of the product to cancel.

MerchantCancellationNo.description: The unique cancellation reference used by the Merchant (sku).

MerchantOrderNo.description: The unique order reference used by the Merchant (sku).

Id.description: The unique cancellation identifier used by ChannelEngine.

MerchantCancellationNo.description: The unique cancellation reference used by the Merchant (sku).

MerchantOrderNo.description: The unique order reference used by the Merchant.

ChannelOrderNo.description: The unique order reference used by the Channel.

CreatedAt.description: The date at which the cancellation was created in ChannelEngine.

MerchantShipmentNo.description: The unique shipment reference used by the Merchant.

MerchantOrderNo.description: The unique order reference used by the Merchant.

ShippedFromCountryCode.description: The code of the country from where the package is being shipped.

PageIndex.description: A page index to get the items (starts from 0)

InvoiceContent.description: Data needed to upload an invoice.

InvoiceNumber.description: The invoice number used in the invoice.

Read.description: Indicating whether the notification is already read using the backoffice.

StockLocationId.description: The ChannelEngine id of the stock location.

Stock.description: The quantity of products in stock at the stock location.

UpdatedAt.description: The timestamp of the last stock update for the stock location.

MerchantProductNo.description: The unique product reference used by the Merchant (sku).

MerchantOrderNo.description: Your own order reference, this will be used in consecutive order processing API calls.

OrderId.description: The ChannelEngine order ID of the order you would like to acknowledge.

MerchantOrderNo.description:
Your own order reference for the order you would like to update the comment for.
Either this field or OrderId is required

OrderId.description:
The ChannelEngine order ID of the order you would like to update the comment for.
Either this field or MerchantOrderNo is required

MerchantComment.description: The merchant comment you would like add / update for the order.

Id.description: The unique identifier used by ChannelEngine.

ChannelOrderLineNo.description: The order line reference used by the channel.

IsFulfillmentByMarketplace.description: Is the order fulfilled by the marketplace (amazon: FBA, bol: LVB, etc.)?.

Gtin.description: Either the GTIN (EAN, ISBN, UPC etc) provided by the channel, or the the GTIN belonging to the MerchantProductNo in ChannelEngine.

Description.description: The product description (or title) provided by the channel.

UnitVat.description:
The total amount of VAT charged over the value of a single unit of the ordered product
(in the shop's base currency calculated using the exchange rate at the time of ordering).

LineTotalInclVat.description:
The total value of the order line (quantity * unit price) including VAT
(in the shop's base currency calculated using the exchange rate at the time of ordering).

LineVat.description:
The total amount of VAT charged over the total value of the order line (quantity * unit price)
(in the shop's base currency calculated using the exchange rate at the time of ordering).

OriginalUnitPriceInclVat.description:
The value of a single unit of the ordered product including VAT
(in the currency in which the order was paid for, see CurrencyCode).

OriginalUnitVat.description:
The total amount of VAT charged over the value of a single unit of the ordered product
(in the currency in which the order was paid for, see CurrencyCode).

OriginalLineTotalInclVat.description:
The total value of the order line (quantity * unit price) including VAT
(in the currency in which the order was paid for, see CurrencyCode).

OriginalLineVat.description:
The total amount of VAT charged over the total value of the order line (quantity * unit price)
(in the currency in which the order was paid for, see CurrencyCode).

OriginalFeeFixed.description:
A percentage fee that is charged by the Channel for this orderline.
This fee rate is based on the currency of client
This field is optional, send 0 if not applicable.

BundleProductMerchantProductNo.description:
If the product is ordered part of a bundle, this field contains the MerchantProductNo of
the product bundle.

JurisCode.description: State assigned code identifying the jurisdiction.

ChannelProductNo.description: The unique product reference used by the channel.

MerchantProductNo.description: The unique product reference used by the merchant.

Quantity.description: The number of items of the product.

CancellationRequestedQuantity.description:
The number of items for which cancellation was requested by the customer.
Some channels allow a customer to cancel an order until it has been shipped.
When an order has already been acknowledged in ChannelEngine, it can only be cancelled by creating a cancellation.
Use this field to check whether it is still possible to cancel the order. If this is the case, submit a cancellation to ChannelEngine.

UnitPriceInclVat.description:
The value of a single unit of the ordered product including VAT
(in the shop's base currency calculated using the exchange rate at the time of ordering).

FeeFixed.description:
A fixed fee that is charged by the Channel for this orderline.
This fee rate is based on the currency of the Channel
This field is optional, send 0 if not applicable.

FeeRate.description:
A percentage fee that is charged by the Channel for this orderline.
This field is optional, send 0 if not applicable.

ExpectedDeliveryDate.description: Expected delivery date from channels, empty if channels not support this value

LatestDeliveryDate.description: Latest delivery date from channels, empty if channels not support this value

ExpectedShipmentDate.description: Expected shipment date from channels, empty if channels not support this value

LatestShipmentDate.description: Latest shipment date from channels, empty if channels not support this value

Id.description:
The unique identifier used by ChannelEngine. This identifier does
not have to be saved. It should only be used in a call to acknowledge the order.

ChannelName.description: The name of the channel for this specific environment/account.

ChannelId.description: The unique ID of the channel for this specific environment/account.

GlobalChannelName.description: The name of the channel across all of ChannelEngine.

GlobalChannelId.description: The unique ID of the channel across all of ChannelEngine.

ChannelOrderNo.description:
The order reference used by the channel.
This number is not guaranteed to be unique accross all orders,
because different channels can use the same order number format.

CommercialOrderNo.description:
The order reference used by the channel for commercial purposes (e.g. on the invoice). Can be different from the ChannelOrderNo.
For example when the internal unique order reference is a unique id or guid, while the commercial order reference is (usually) a human readable reference that can be reused or used for multiple sellers by the channel.

MerchantOrderNo.description: The unique order reference used by the Merchant

IsBusinessOrder.description: Indicating whether the order is a business order.

AcknowledgedDate.description: The date the order was acknowledged in ChannelEngine.

CreatedAt.description: The date the order was created in ChannelEngine.

UpdatedAt.description: The date the order was last updated in ChannelEngine.

MerchantComment.description: The optional comment a merchant can add to an order.

SubTotalInclVat.description:
The total value of the order lines including VAT
(in the shop's base currency calculated using the exchange rate at the time of ordering).

SubTotalVat.description:
The total amount of VAT charged over the order lines
(in the shop's base currency calculated using the exchange rate at the time of ordering).

ShippingCostsVat.description:
The total amount of VAT charged over the shipping fee
(in the shop's base currency calculated using the exchange rate at the time of ordering).

TotalInclVat.description:
The total value of the order including VAT
(in the shop's base currency calculated using the exchange rate at the time of ordering).

TotalVat.description:
The total amount of VAT charged over the total value of te order
(in the shop's base currency calculated using the exchange rate at the time of ordering).

OriginalSubTotalInclVat.description:
The total value of the order lines including VAT
(in the currency in which the order was paid for, see CurrencyCode).

OriginalSubTotalVat.description:
The total amount of VAT charged over the order lines
(in the currency in which the order was paid for, see CurrencyCode).

OriginalShippingCostsInclVat.description:
The shipping fee including VAT
(in the currency in which the order was paid for, see CurrencyCode).

OriginalShippingCostsVat.description:
The total amount of VAT charged over the shipping fee
(in the currency in which the order was paid for, see CurrencyCode).

OriginalTotalInclVat.description:
The total value of the order including VAT
(in the currency in which the order was paid for, see CurrencyCode).

OriginalTotalVat.description:
The total amount of VAT charged over the total value of te order
(in the currency in which the order was paid for, see CurrencyCode).

LanguageCode.description: The language of the order. Has to be a 2-letter ISO language code.

CompanyRegistrationNo.description: Optional. A company's chamber of commerce number.

PaymentMethod.description: The payment method used on the order.

PaymentReferenceNo.description: Reference or transaction id for the payment

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code for the amounts of the order.

OrderDate.description: The date the order was created at the channel.

ChannelCustomerNo.description: The unique customer reference used by the channel.

Key.description: Name of the extra data field.

Value.description: Value of the extra data field.

IsPublic.description: Add this field to the export of the product feed to the channel.

LanguageIsoCode.description: The 2-letter ISO code of the extra data

Key.description: Name of the extra data field.

Value.description: Value of the extra data field.

IsPublic.description: Add this field to the export of the product feed to the channel.

LanguageIsoCode.description: The 2-letter ISO code of the extra data

ParentMerchantProductNo.description:
If this product is a different version of another
product (for example, all fields are the same except
size), then this field should contain
the 'MerchantProductNo' of the parent. The parent
should already exist (or be present between the products
in the content of the API call, it does not matter whether
the parent is behind the child in the list).

ParentMerchantProductNo2.description:
If this product is a different version of another
product (for example, all fields are the same except
color) and itself is a parent with child products (e.g. of sizes),
then this field should contain the 'MerchantProductNo' of the grandparent. The grandparent
should already exist (or be present between the products
in the content of the API call, it does not matter whether
the grandparent is behind the child in the list).
When you set this field, the ParentMerchantProductNo should be left empty.
            
Use this field in case of three level product hierarchy,
e.g. model - color - size.
This is required for channels like Otto.

ExtraData.description:
An optional list of key-value pairs containing
extra data about this product. This data can be
sent to channels or used for filtering products.

Description.description:
A description of the product. Can contain these HTML tags:
div, span, pre, p, br, hr, hgroup, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, ul, ol, li, dl, dt, dd, strong, em, b, i, u, img, a, abbr, address, blockquote, area, audio, video, caption, table, tbody, td, tfoot, th, thead, tr.

Size.description: Optional. The size of the product (variant). E.g. fashion size (S-XL, 46-56, etc), width of the watch, etc..

Color.description: Optional. The color of the product (variant).

Ean.description: The EAN of GTIN of the product.

ManufacturerProductNumber.description: The unique product reference used by the manufacturer/vendor of the product.

MerchantProductNo.description: A unique identifier of the product. (sku).

Stock.description: The number of items in stock.

PurchasePrice.description: Optional. The purchase price of the product. Useful for repricing.

ShippingTime.description:
A textual representation of the shippingtime.
For example, in Dutch: 'Op werkdagen voor 22:00 uur besteld, morgen in huis'.

Url.description:
A URL pointing to the merchant's webpage
which displays this product.

ImageUrl.description:
A URL at which an image of this product
can be found.

ExtraImageUrl1.description: Url to an additional image of product (1).

ExtraImageUrl2.description: Url to an additional image of product (2).

ExtraImageUrl3.description: Url to an additional image of product (3).

ExtraImageUrl4.description: Url to an additional image of product (4).

ExtraImageUrl5.description: Url to an additional image of product (5).

ExtraImageUrl6.description: Url to an additional image of product (6).

ExtraImageUrl7.description: Url to an additional image of product (7).

ExtraImageUrl8.description: Url to an additional image of product (8).

ExtraImageUrl9.description: Url to an additional image of product (9).

IsFrozen.description: Specifies whether Product is disabled on all channels.

CategoryTrail.description:
The category to which this product belongs.
Please supply this field in the following format:
'maincategory > category > subcategory'
For example:
'vehicles > bikes > mountainbike'.

IsActive.description: Is the product active for the Merchant?.

ParentMerchantProductNo.description: A unique identifier of the parent product. (parent sku).

ParentMerchantProductNo2.description: A unique identifier of the grandparent product. (grandparent sku).

A description of the product. Can contain these HTML tags:
div, span, pre, p, br, hr, hgroup, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, ul, ol, li, dl, dt, dd, strong, em, b, i, u, img, a, abbr, address, blockquote, area, audio, video, caption, table, tbody, td, tfoot, th, thead, tr.

Size.description: Optional. The size of the product (variant). E.g. fashion size (S-XL, 46-56, etc), width of the watch, etc..

Color.description: Optional. The color of the product (variant).

A textual representation of the shippingtime.
For example, in Dutch: 'Op werkdagen voor 22:00 uur besteld, morgen in huis'.

Url.description:
A URL pointing to the merchant's webpage
which displays this product.

ImageUrl.description:
A URL at which an image of this product
can be found.

Please supply this field in the following format:

For example:

BuyBoxPrice.description:
Price of Buy box winner (excl. shipping cost)
Note: not all channels have a separate shipping cost field (e.g. bol.com), so can be the same as BuyBoxPriceInclShipping

BuyBoxPriceInclShipping.description:
Price of Buy box winner (incl. shipping cost).
If null, then there is no data or no Buy box winner

IsMerchantBuyBoxWinner.description: Are you the Buy box winner or not?

Name.description: The channel's name for the shipping label carrier

Code.description: The channel's code for the shipping label carrier

Restrictions.description: Optional. Any restrictions on this carriers, e.g. weight and/or dimensions

Price.description: Optional. Price for this shipping label

HandoverDateTime.description:
Optional. When to handover the package to the carrier
It is in the ISO format including the timezone offset.
E.g. 2020-10-03T18:00:00+02:00
which is 3rd Oct 2020, at 18:00 PM in Amsterdam (Summer Time aka CEST: UTC +2:00 )

StockLocationId.description: The stock location id of the updated stock. If not provided, the stock from the default stock location will be updated.

Name.description: The unique name of a webhook.

Url.description: The callback URL used by a webhook. E.g.: https://test-store.com/callback.

IsActive.description: Determines if a webhook is active, and callbacks should proceed.

Events.description: The events supported by the webhook.

ShipmentFulfillmentType.description:
Shipment is fully fulfilled by channel or merchant
so no make sense to use FulfillmentType for orders
It is created to keep it consistent with others

MerchantShipmentNo.description: The number the merchant uses to identify this PO shipment

ShippedDate.description: When the shipment will be/was shipped

EstimatedDeliveryDate.description: Estimated delivery time in the channel's warehouse

SellingPartyId.description: The merchant's identifying 'selling party number' at the channel

ShipToPartyId.description: The destination's 'ship to party' number at the channel

BillOfLadingNumber.description: Bill Of Lading (BOL) number is the unique number assigned by the vendor. The BOL present in the Shipment Confirmation message ideally matches the paper BOL provided with the shipment, but that is no must. Instead of BOL, an alternative reference number (like Delivery Note Number) for the shipment can also be sent in this field.

Lines.description: Shipment information for each shipped product
